casebody.data:
Columbus Bar Association v. Schafer.

[Cite as Columbus Bar Assn. v. Schafer (1994), 68 Ohio St.3d 340.]

(No. 93-2169 Submitted December 7, 1993 Decided February 23, 1994.) *341Geoffrey Stem, Disciplinary Counsel, and Bruce A. Campbell, Assistant Disciplinary Counsel, for relator. Per Curiam.

We concur in the findings and recommendations of the board. Respondent is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick and F.E. Sweeney, JJ., concur. Pfeifer, J., dissents and would publicly reprimand respondent.
